Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.app.taskmanager.contoller.GlobalExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler that centralizes error handling for all REST controllers.

This class uses reactive Mono responses and returns consistent error responses wrapped in ResponseDto. Each exception type is handled separately and returns an appropriate HTTP status code.

  • Method Details

    • entityNotFound

      @ExceptionHandler(EntityNotFoundException.class) @ResponseStatus(NOT_FOUND) public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ResponseDto<String>> entityNotFound(EntityNotFoundException e)
      Handles EntityNotFoundException by returning a 404 NOT FOUND response.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception indicating that an entity was not found
      Returns:
      a Mono<ResponseDto> containing the error message

    • handleValidationException

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.support.WebExchangeBindException.class) @ResponseStatus(BAD_REQUEST) public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ResponseDto<String>> handleValidationException(org.springframework.web.bind.support.WebExchangeBindException ex)
      Handles validation errors thrown during request binding.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception containing validation errors
      Returns:
      a Mono<ResponseDto> containing concatenated validation error messages

      Returns:
      a Mono<ResponseDto> containing the error message

      Handles ServerWebInputException, which occurs when input cannot be properly parsed.

      Returns:
      a Mono<ResponseDto> with a generic invalid input message

    • GlobalExceptionHandler

      @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class) @ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ResponseDto<String>> GlobalExceptionHandler(RuntimeException e)
      Handles all other unhandled exceptions by returning a 500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR response.
      Parameters:
      e - the thrown exception
      Returns:
      a Mono<ResponseDto> containing the exception message
